NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: The location permission provides extra information on your wireless network and internet provider. This information is recorded only when a scan is running.

NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: To optimize your network speed and performance, we need to test connectivity to all connected devices.
